fields.name: FailureThreshold
fields.description: The number of failures to allow before returning an unhealthy status.

fields.name: InitialDelay
fields.description: The delay before the first probe in ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: Period
fields.description: The length of time between probes in ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: SuccessThreshold
fields.description: The number of successful probes before returning a healthy status.

fields.name: Timeout
fields.description: The probe timeout in ISO 8601 format.
